showerReviews.reviewText: Nice place to unwind... Has everything you need shower etc . Water is on the dark side, but the fish don't mind....

… . I assume we were in the big-rig friendly one which was Pier 51. Pretty clean, didn't use public restroom or shower so can't comment on that. Grass could have been mowed around but I'm not sure how much rain they have had. As …
… The (warm/hot) shower and toilet facilities are new and kept clean. No fighting or waiting to use your RV shower/toilet.

Very nice state park with campground near the lake. Inexpensive at $27 a night for full hookups. Bathroom and showers could be kept cleaner. Shower has curtain but no door. 2 showers with 3/4 wall between them lacks privacy.

… near Pier 51, and Paradise Cottage). The campsite is really nice. Well maintained and clean toilet and shower blocks. Small site that is well shaded, plus with a children's play area near by. The cottage provides bedding and towels but you …

… The restrooms and showers were totally replaced about 2 years ago and there are 4 of each in both of the main campgrounds. Each restroom and each shower are totally private and can be locked so you don't have to be concerned about someone …

… a disaster. After washing my hands, I grabbed a hand towel, and a bed bug fell out along with a cockroach. To make things worse, the TV and shower were both broken. We reported everything immediately and decided to leave. This morning, …

Definitely better than it used to be. They have made several updates to the park including newer playground equipment, resurfaced the roads, new restroom and shower facilities ect ect. Just wish the lake wasn't so damn dirty.
Loved our stay  - all bathroom and shower facilities looked brand new. We stayed at Lower Lake and enjoyed our overnight stay with beautiful scenery.

… Very nice. Clean facilities and camp ground. Very quiet and relaxing with a playground, walking trails, and a boat ramp. Bathroom and shower on site. Full RV hookup sites. FYI the connecting sewer pipe is removable. Otherwise it would …

showerReviews.reviewText: … . We were there 4 nights and I don't think anyone cleaned them. Ran out of toilet paper and not replenished. Shower is a push button so the water only stays on a very short time. Not heated in bathroom so pretty cold in 50 degree weather.

Very nice campground with lakeview. Clean bathroom with shower facilities. Very friendly  and polite campground host. Really enjoyed staying over there. However in woman's bathroom, 1 toilet was unclean. Woman's Shower was not working.

… nice and neat. Bathrooms didn't have hand soap so I'd recommend bringing your own. The showers were decently warm. I didn't like that one of the showers and toilets didn't have doors just a shower curtain over it. The quiet time is …
Such a quiet, clean park with a sandy beach area for swimming. Shower even has hot water  plus a play area for children. I plan on taking my fishing gear on the next trip to Heyburn Park!
Very nice park with a small beach. Shower in one bathroom was stuck on boiling, but other restrooms were nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: … hours. She explained they had spoken less than 45 min ago. His response was “you probably took a shower and got confused” whatever that means. I usually make it a point to go to Pilot/Flying J as I’ve always had quality service. This one …

The parking is always bad here because it's probably one of the only few truck stops in this city. However the shower and toilet in the shower room makes up for it. Nice water pressure, decent sized shower room and fat friendly toilet.

Came for a shower it was clean thank god! Bad part is I’m sweating the entire time I’m getting dressed. It’s no ac inside the bathroom with the showers just a FAN! THAT ISN’T ENOUGH please fix this problem. I paid almost $20 to be back …

CLEANEST SHOWER I HAVE SEEN IN MONTHS! There wasn't even a spec of dust in the fan!  ATTENTION WEARY TRAVELERS!! Forget your misconceptions of "truck stops" and don't "settle" for a rest area. (Not in a semi? You are allowed to park …

No hot water yet again. Who the hell wants to take shower in this freezing water when it’s in the 40’s outside with the air conditioning on. Y’all are nuts. This is why people get sick. Fix your hot water if not keeps the showers closed

… a keeper. Wonderful warm sincere greeting.  Took my shower grabbed a salad and she was busy with paperwork but asked if she could help me and rang me up…again with that sincere smile.  She is professional and efficient. I will make …

90% of the truck parking is paid. There was 0 unpaid spots available at 1pm on a Thursday and a 1 hour wait for a shower. Used to come here years ago and it was halfway decent. Now it’s an overused garbage dump that aims to extort drivers …

Shower is clean…
Parking always full ..
is not bad..

130 parking about 20 of them is free $24  for parking shower is really filthy and bathroom was super nasty customer service was horrible and the security guard don't know how to talk to people very rude no sign say reserved parking but they …

showerReviews.reviewText: Staff is helpful, facility is clean and nice! Rented for a baby shower and it went over very nicely. …

… covered shelters with electrical access, rock climbing, recreation center with gymnasium that has clean restrooms indoors, plus a shower, playgrounds for the kids , a pool with lifeguards present, basketball courts, and they put on a nice …
Beautiful park. We had my son and girlfriends wedding shower there in one of the pavillions and it was lovely.
Nice facility but the community center room, booked for the baby shower was extremely warm.

locations.content: Heyburn Swim Venue may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is one of the nicest and largest park swim beach areas I have seen on this trip. And the first in Oklahoma. The water isn't really clean looking but it's the first sand beach. Most of them are all rocks and very difficult to walk on.
Great little lake to enjoy some fishing or time with family and friends, very clean park.

Yes, I went here for my wife's birthday. We had a blast water that was perfect. We went to the electric side. The lake area was very clean. Everyone was polite. Especially the people by the gate. They made me feel more at home than camping. We loved it. Thank you

Was really nice and quiet. Bathrooms are nice and close. Picnic tables are all really close. My only complaint is that there is no outer boundary for the swim area and there aren't any "No Wake" bouys either.  So there were boats that were blowing by too close. Other than that - we loved it.
Heyburn is looking much much nicer and cleaner then the last time I was here. Its been a few years. We went to just walk the beach. Nice day at the lake.
